Title: microsoft-open-hack-containers-v2

ContentItems.Title: Challenge 0: Getting Ready to Go
ContentItems.Description: Get tools and resources ready to start

ContentItems.Title: Challenge 1: But First, Containers
ContentItems.Description: Build, run and test Docker containers

ContentItems.Title: Challenge 2: Getting Ready for Orchestration
ContentItems.Description: Deploy your containers to a test cluster

ContentItems.Title: Challenge 4: Putting the Pieces Together
ContentItems.Description: Deploy your containers to the cluster and manage and secure your kubernetes secrets

ContentItems.Title: Challenge 5: Wait, Whats Happening
ContentItems.Description: Identify, troubleshoot, and debug issues with your cluster

ContentItems.Description: Introduce Windows workloads to your cluster
